resources.string: Happy Moments Always Needs To Be Enrolled
Enroll Your Great Memories \nWith History And Location
Remember The Greatest Memories \n Any Time
To Add New Memory You Should Give Us Request To Access Location
The Application wants this permission to save your Location with Memory
We want this permission to save your memory eith images
Application Wants this permission to show you your memories
Application Wants Camera permission To take Happy Memmories and save it In your Galaries
